AboutUs.title: About Us
AboutUs.content: Gurikiro.com is a free platform that offers Real Estate Deals for Investors as well as Home Buyers. Gurikiro.com also helps new Real Estate Entrepreneurs by offering them a free service to showcase their properties and share with their future potential customers. Gurikiro.com is currently available in Somalia. We are also planning to expand to Djibouti, Ethiopia, Kenya. Feel free to contact us for any query, feedback or investment opportunities.

one.title: Easy To Use
one.content: Simple to use service for your business. No need to install anything. Just use the service and start your business.

two.title: Free Service
two.content: Our Service does not charge any fee for using our this website. You can use our service for free.

three.title: Wide Range of Properties
three.content: We have a wide range of properties for you to choose. You can choose any property you want.

four.title: Opportunity To Expand
four.content: Our service are open to you to expand your business. We are always ready to help you.
